org.openimaj.image.processing

Class CLImageArithmetic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.CLImageArithmetic

  • public class CLImageArithmetic
extends Object
    Simple image arithmetic functions implemented using OpenCL.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
